# GitHub Pages Deployer Agent

## Purpose
Updates the arxiv.html page with fetched and summarized papers, then pushes changes to GitHub Pages.

## Responsibilities
1. **HTML Generation**: Dynamically update arxiv.html with paper data
2. **Git Operations**: Commit changes to repository
3. **GitHub Pages Deployment**: Push to branch configured for GitHub Pages
4. **Verification**: Confirm successful deployment

## Deployment Flow
```
1. Fetch latest summarized papers (from previous agent)
2. Generate/update arxiv.html with paper grid/list
3. Stage changes (git add)
4. Create commit with timestamp
5. Push to deployment branch (typically 'main' or 'gh-pages')
6. Verify GitHub Pages build completion
7. Log deployment URL
```

## HTML Update Strategy

### Target File
- **Location**: `/arxiv.html` (root of repository)
- **Structure**: Preserve navigation, update content section only
- **Styling**: Use classes from `/css/style.css`

### Paper Display Template
Each paper should display:
- **Title** (linked to arXiv URL)
- **Authors** (comma-separated)
- **Published Date**
- **Summary** (generated by Summarizer agent)
- **Key Points** (if available)
- **Direct arXiv Link**

### HTML Structure
```html
<section id="arxiv-papers" class="papers-grid">
  <article class="paper-card">
    <h3><a href="...">Paper Title</a></h3>
    <p class="authors">By Author One, Author Two</p>
    <p class="date">Published: 2024-02-17</p>
    <p class="summary">Generated summary...</p>
    <ul class="key-points">
      <li>Key point 1</li>
      <li>Key point 2</li>
    </ul>
    <a href="..." class="arxiv-link">Read on arXiv</a>
  </article>
  <!-- More papers... -->
</section>
```

## Git Configuration

### Commit Details
- **Author**: Copilot <223556219+Copilot@users.noreply.github.com>
- **Message Format**: `chore: update arxiv papers [YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss UTC]`
- **Commit Trailer**: Include Co-authored-by trailer

### Push Strategy
- **Branch**: Main deployment branch (e.g., 'main')
- **Force Push**: Disabled (safe mode)
- **Authentication**: Use GitHub token from secrets

## GitHub Pages Configuration
- **Source**: Deploy from branch
- **Branch**: main (configurable)
- **Path**: / (root)
- **Build**: Automatic (GitHub Pages handles static files)

## Verification & Logging

### Success Criteria
- ✓ Git commit created successfully
- ✓ Changes pushed to remote
- ✓ GitHub Pages build triggered
- ✓ Live URL accessible

### Logging
- Deployment timestamp
- Commit SHA
- Files changed count
- Live site URL
- Build status (if available)

## Error Handling
- Retry on transient git failures (max 3 times)
- Log detailed error messages
- Preserve original HTML if update fails
- Alert on authentication failures

## Configuration
```yaml
deployment_repo: katsaxton/bst236website
branch: main
github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
commit_message_prefix: "chore: update arxiv papers"
verification_timeout: 120  # seconds
```
